data.title: Best Tax Lawyers in Spain
data.meta_description: View the top attorneys in Best Lawyers in Spain for Tax Law and receive an overview of lawyer recognitions & more.
data.text:
Isaac Abad Garrido

D. Isaac Abad Garrido, has Bachelor’s Degrees in Law and Business Sciences by the University of Murcia and a Bachelor’s Degree in Administration and Business Management by the University “Cardenal Herrera CEU” from Valencia. He completed his academic training with his Master in Tax Law Consulting for Businesses in the Instituto de Empresa (Madrid) and the Official Master in Practical Advocacy in The Catholic University of San Antonio in Murcia. He is also a Registered ...

Alfonso Arroyo Díez

Born in Barcelona, in 1.967. Founder of Tornos Abogados, S.L.P. He graduates in Law at the University of Barcelona, in 1.990. Attorney, he is member of the Illustrious School of Attorneys of Barcelona. Master in consultancy and Tax Management by ESADE Business School (1.992-1.993), Master in Tax Law by the “Universidad Complutense de Madrid” (1.991-1.992) and Master in Real State and Town planning Law by the University Pompeu Fabra (1.994-1.995). In 2.013, he obtains his PhD in Pu...

José Azqueta Nerecan

WORK DEPARTMENT Tax POSITION José has over 18 years experience in leading transactional work, particularly for private equity houses and real estate investment funds on complex deals (tax structuring, due diligence and tax modelling etc.) He has led tax advice on some of the most important processes that have taken place in recent years in Spain. CAREER José joined Pérez-Llorca as partner in 2019, bringing more than 17 years of experience working on M&A Tax teams in B...

Yolanda Casadevall Bañuelos

Yolanda Casadevall Bañuelos ycb@avqlegal.com Tax Partner Education Postgraduate course in Merger Operations and Corporate Restructuring (2002), ESADE. Postgraduate course in International Taxation, VAT and Corporate Tax (2001), CEF. English for Law (1998), Westminster College (London). Law degree (1997) by the University of Barcelona. Law International Program (1996), Gothenburg University (Sweden). Professional Experience and Areas of Specialization I joined the firm in 2016 and I am ...

Manuel Cuchet Aguirre

Lawyer, member of the Madrid Bar Association since 1985. He has had a long career as a lawyer with extensive knowledge in the field of Tax Law . Manuel Cuchet is currently the managing partner of Mas y Calvet law firm , where he has dedicated his entire professional career.

Jordi de Juan

State Lawyer (Exc.), he was Head State Lawyer at the Tax Delegation of Girona (1996-2000) and later Deputy Head State Lawyer at the Special Delegation of the AEAT of Catalonia (2004-2005). He joined as a Tax partner at Cuatrecasas Gonçalves Pereira (2005-2015) and subsequently as a Tax Controversy partner at EY (2015-2020). He has recently (April 2020) joined Crowe Legal and is currently the partner in charge of the Tax Litigation team at Crowe Legal y Tributario. Jordi acts as managin...

Elena García de la Torre Sanz

Partner of the Tax Department of Crowe Legal y Tributario since April 2020 and responsible for the Madrid office. She has 20 years of experience in the practice of law. She began her professional career as a lawyer specializing in the field of tax advice in 2002 at Cuatrecasas in Barcelona; in 2006 she joined KPMG and in 2008 PwC, where she was appointed partner in 2017. In 2022 she joined Crowe as Partner of the Tax Area and head of the Madrid office of Crowe Legal y Tributario. Elena has an...

Elena Escura Esteban

Elena is Head of both the International Tax department and the department of Global Mobility. She came to BUFETE ESCURA in 2018, having previously worked in the Global Mobility department at KPMG for five years. She was a key member of the team responsible for taxation of expatriates as well as analyzing and advising on all immigration and social security aspects of their work placement in Spain. International Tax Foreign company tax assistance with setting up companies/branches in Spain. Tax...

Fernando Escura Serés

Fernando Escura has been Managing Partner of Bufete Escura since 1987, and heads the Corporate and Commercial practice of the firm. Escura has extensive experience in Corporate, M&A, and Tax matters. He is an Arbiter of the International European Association AEADE. Member of the Board of important national and global companies, with special incidence in the automotive, oil, metallurgical and pharmaceutical industries, Escura is the adviser to a significant number of Industrial Association...

Alejandra Flores

Practice Areas Tax. Alejandra has extensive experience with management and inspection procedures before the Tax Authorities and has been involved in the preparation of numerous appeals and complaints before the ordinary courts and the economic administrative courts against acts issued by the Tax Authorities. She advises companies and their shareholders, whether resident in Spain or not, on direct and indirect tax matters, especially those related to remuneration and incentives plans. She also...

Rafael Fontana

Rafael Fontana is a Senior Partner at Cuatrecasas. He has been the Senior Partner of Cuatrecasas since 2014. He is an expert lawyer specializing in tax, particularly in planning family business groups, and in acquisitions, mergers and joint ventures of national and international business groups. He is a member of the board of directors of important business groups and of the board of trustees of several foundations. Mr. Fontana has advised on and been involved in the strategic planning of som...

José María García Guirao

Managing Partner – Fiscal Area José María García Guirao is the managing partner of the Fiscal Area at Devesa & Calvo Abogados in the Province of Alicante. García Guirao has amassed significant experience in providing tax advice to national and international companies. Having joined from Garrigues, where he was manager of the Tax Litigation Area in the Alicante office, and from PricewaterhouseCoopers, he has helped companies in different industries to opti...

Jose Maria García-Valdecasas Alloza

With more than 15 years’ experience as a lawyer, having practised in some of Spain’s best legal firms, Jose Maria García-Valdecasas prides himself on his client-first approach. Thanks to his academic background in economics (MBA from ESADE Business School incorporating an exchange with UCLA Anderson School of Management and studies in finance at The London School of Economics and Political Science) Jose Maria is well placed to get to the bottom of his clients’ problem...

Javier González Carcedo

Javier Gonzalez Carcedo joined PwC at the beginning of 2006 as the national leader of PwC Spain’s Transfer Pricing Group. Javier is qualified in Economic Sciences, Business Studies and Law and integrates the body of National Finance Inspectors in Spain. Between 2000 and 2003, he was Coordinator of International Taxation within the General Directorate for Taxation at the Ministry of Finance, which is competent authority for international tax matters in Spain. In 2003, he joined the cabin...

Manuel Guardiola Tassara

Specialized in the constitution and internal restructuring of business groups, acquisition of entities, design of corporate structures, proposal of tax planning policies, and in general, tax advisory to groups of companies with national and international presence, as well as advising family groups. He also has extensive experience in tax inspections at the state, regional, and local levels, as well as in economic-administrative claims, appeals before the Courts of Justice, and procedures for ...

Clara Jiménez

Clara joined Pérez-Llorca as partner in 2006. Clara has extensive experience in Public Administrations, as Tax Inspector for over 10 years, and in the private sector. She advises national and foreign clients within all branches of tax law and foreign trade. Clara specialises in obtaining tax rulings from tax authorities, in tax audits and appeals before judicial instances, in procedural matters as well as direct and indirect taxation. Practice areas: Tax, wealth management

Ernesto Lacambra

Ernesto Lacambra is a co-managing partner of Cases & Lacambra. He leads the Tax practice. Ernesto Lacambra is specialised in advising multinational groups, private equity firms and foreign and national investment funds and in the international tax planning of cross-border investments. He has extensive experience on mergers and acquisitions and reorganisations of multinational groups. In particular, he has focused on the reorganisation of Spanish holding companies for Latin American groups...

Fernando Lafita

Partner at Argali, Abogados Fernando Lafita is a specialist in tax law and especially in restructuring, company acquisition, and overall family office advising. he has advised companies from a wide array of sectors on share and asset deals, as well as company trading and wealth and business restructuring. He sits on the board of trustees of several public welfare nonprofit organizations, foundations, and associations. He has spoken at many conferences on a variety of tax matters. Fernando has...

Joaquín Latorre Tambo

Joaquín is currently Partner of Landwell-PwC, specialized in taxation of financial entities and leading the Tax Management & Accounting Services team in Spain (more than 100 professionals distributed in the Spanish territory and located in the main Spanish offices). Joaquín has a wide experience (22 years) in the tax advise of financial domestic groups and international companies, in the financial sector and in other industries. He is the tax adviser of the Spanish Associati...

Diego Marín-Barnuevo

Practice Areas Tax. Diego has gained the majority of his professional experience at universities, although he also has extensive experience in private practice since he complements his teaching activities with legal advising at different public and private institutions. His main areas of research have included: tax proceedings, litigation, local taxation and personal income taxation. Career Diego Marín-Barnuevo joined Pérez-Llorca in October 2017. Education He lectures at Univer...

Alberto Monreal Lasheras

Alberto Monreal, Partner responsible of Indirect Taxes Team and Technical Office in PwC Tax & Legal Services. Admitted as a lawyer since 2006 (Tax Auditor from 1988) Status Partner Legal areas Indirect Taxes (VAT, etc.) Languages Spanish, English, French, Italian References · Advice of relevant groups · Dispute resolution in relevant cases · Litigation · Advice in Indirect taxes (other than VAT, i.e. excises, electricity, etc.) to multinational groups Other inf...

Fernando Moreno Cea

Lawyer, member of the Madrid Bar Association since 1985. He directs the Department of Social economy and Non-Profit Organizations , which offers legal and tax advise to foundations, associations and other third sector entities that work in social assistance, education and international cooperation. He is also a specialist in Tax Law .

Meritxell Nadal Bentade

Degree in Economics from Universidad de Barcelona. She holds an Executive Master in taxes by ESADE. She has more than 15 year’s professional experience with tax consulting. She has wide experience in International Assignment Services, design and implementation of Compensation and Benefits Plans, definition of Compensation programs for Senior Executives, etc.

David Navarro

David Navarro is a partner at Cases&Lacambra in Spain. His practice is focused on Tax Law. He has an extensive experience on advising family business groups, large national and multinational business groups, private equity firms and investment funds both in domestic and international environment, in relation to group restructuring and corporate reorganization (mergers, acquisitions, divestments, etc.), international tax planning of cross-border investments and ongoing tax advice. He has a...

Rafael Nuñez Blazquez

Professional experience Rafael Nuñez is a tax partner with the People Services group of KPMG Abogados in Spain. He joined KPMG in 2009, and has over 20 years of experience, having previously worked as Managing Partner in the Tax Area of Landwell-PriceWaterhouseCoopers. Rafael has broad experience in rendering tax advisory services both to companies and individuals, with special emphasis on international tax advice and planning, and in international tax law in general, as well as in ren...

Pedro Olmedilla Almarza

Pedro is a partner in the Banking and Capital Markets Group. He has worked in tax for over 21 years, the last 12 of which have been in PwC Madrid. He has focused on the tax advice for multinational clients operating in Spain as well as local clients of the financial industry (banks, saving banks, leasing companies etc.). This work includes advising on corporate tax, withholding taxes and capital gain taxes and the taxation of financial instruments. He has been as well specifically advised to ...

Silvia Parés Ravetllat

Partner of PwC Currently, Silvia is the partner in charge of the TICEM (Technology, Infocomm, Entertainment, Media and Energy) tax department located in Barcelona. Economist. Silvia has a degree in Business Administration and Management and a Master’s degree in Tax Advisory from ESADE. She is teacher of tax law in ESADE. Over 18 years’ service with the tax department of PwC and member of the M&A Tax group for over 10 years providing, almost exclusively, tax advisory services f...
